kpi_info.title: RRC Connected UEs Avg
kpi_info.use: The average number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED state over the measurement period. The average value is the arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED state. UPDATED: This counter is updated after each sampling interval with the arithmetical average of samples each representing the number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED state at that moment.
